container-title: —The student should be made practically acquainted with the form of the sori and the various chlamydospores of Puccinia glamarum, P
note: disfersa, P. coronata and P. coronifera, which attack the common cereals.
title: The secidia occur in spring on the young shoots, the uredospores and teleutospores making their appearance later on the fully developed stems and branches
